Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I recover a deleted file on Android?  Data Recovery - How to Restore Deleted / Formatted Files on HD Micro SD Card  Is there a way to recover deleted photos from my device? I deleted some pictures but now I want to restore them. I tried several file recovery applications, but they only gave me empty image files.
Title: Is there a way to recover deleted photos?

history.Text: There is a way to recover deleted photos I deleted some pictures and I want to restore them I tried several file recovery applications, but it returned me empty image files..
There is a way to recover deleted photos?

Is there a way to recover deleted photos?
